== Debugging procedure ==

=== Reporting a bug ===

* When reporting a problem with hardware detection, you should report the bug against the <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/linux|linux]]</nowiki> kernel package.
* If the system is not correctly detecting a USB device, also '''attach''' the output of:
** lsusb -v > lsusb-v.log
